resources.string:
Use the checkboxes to select which field the keywords apply to.

Use commas to separate the filter into multiple keywords.

Example, to show only HTTP and HTTPS traffic, ensure Ports is checked and set filter to: 80,443

Use an exclaimation mark to negate a keyword.

Example, to find all non-HTTP packets from google.com, ensure Addresses and Ports are checked and set filter to: google.com,!80
